name: Junimo, catch!
description:
Catch the fruits!

Unlock events, dodge meteors and lightning strikes, upgrade your speed and catch colorful fruits.

Over time, fruits will spawn and fall faster.

Thanks to Feidry for doing most of the programming! Great guy.

This is the first game I ever worked on :)

This game is inspired by "Stardew Valley", developed by ConcernedApe
